name: right click to add mark in vscode

marks.name: read current waystation
marks.body:
First try using TextDocumentContentProvider to read the json file
direclty from the file system, then parse its JSON 
and store it within the scope of the command

vscode.workspace.registerTextDocumentContentProvider(myScheme, myProvider);

marks.name: add mark command
marks.body:
register the file system read and logic for writing a mark
in the extensions activate method
https: //code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#Extension%3CT%3E

marks.name: add mark from context menu
marks.body:
https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/contribution-points#contributes.menus

once the activation and command are settled, 
only one further implementation detail should be required,
wiring up the command to the context menu in package.json
